response.overview: Niroth is an 18-year-old girl without a driver's license, yet she stole her father's car to go out and get drunk. Unfortunately, she collided with two motorcyclists, a father and his son, both of whom tragically lost their lives. Niroth drove away without taking any responsibility for her actions. Following the incident, she started to be haunted by the ghosts of the father and son. Can she survive in the end?
response.title: The Follower
